mapper.select: select * from boardPan where PanDel='y' order by panName
select * from boardPan order by PanDel desc, panName asc
select * from boardText where PanId=#{panId} and TextDel='n' order by textNum desc

select textnum, lpad('↪ ',(level-1)*3,' ')||textname text, textWriterId, textWriteDate, textnump, level from (select rownum rnum, a.* from (select boardText.* from boardText where PanId=#{panId} and TextDel='n' order by textNum desc) a) where rnum between #{page}*#{pageSize}-(#{pageSize}-1) and #{page}*#{pageSize} start with textnump is null connect by prior textnum = textnump order siblings by SeqNum desc, textnum asc
select count(*) from boardText where PanId=#{panId} and TextDel='n'
mapper.insert: insert into addFile values( AddFileNum.nextVal, TextNum.currval+2, #{addFileUrl}, #{addFileName})
insert into boardReply values(ReplyID.nextVal, #{textNum}, #{replySub}, #{replyerId}, SYSDATE, #{replyDel}, null)
mapper.select: select * from boardReply where TextNum=#{textNum} and replyDel='n' order by replyDate desc
mapper.update: update boardReply set replyDel='y' where ReplyId=#{replyId}
